paper_abstract: The purpose of this paper is to prove a related fixed point in S-complete Hausdorff uniform space. For this we use the concept of E-distance, which is introduced by Aamri and El-Moutawakil [1, 2], in uniform space and some metric versions of related fixed point theorems.
paper_title: A related fixed point theorem for maps in two S-complete Hausdorff uniform spaces
